qa.name: Luna
qa.appearance: Petite with curly auburn hair and bright blue eyes
qa.clothing: Colorful overalls and a striped t-shirt

json_to_edit.voice_over: In the attic of her grandmother's house, Luna discovered a world beyond her wildest dreams.
json_to_edit.description: Luna finds a magical book that brings stories to life in her grandmother's attic.
json_to_edit.lighting: Soft, golden sunlight through a small window
json_to_edit.name: The Magical Book
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Luna discovers a magical book in her grandmother's attic that brings stories to life.

qa.action: Luna enters the attic, surrounded by old furniture and boxes.

hf.action: Luna's eyes widen as she spots an ornate book on a shelf.

tr.action: Luna carefully opens the book, revealing shimmering illustrations.

xc.action: The attic transforms into a lush forest as the book's magic activates.

ka.action: Luna's amazed expression as she looks around the magical forest.

fn.action: Luna cautiously approaches a talking rabbit from the story.

af.action: The forest slowly fades back into the attic as Luna closes the book.

edit_command: Add a new shot after every three existing shots, but don't change anything else in the scene.

label.rationale: we will add two new shots to the scene, one after the third existing shot and another after the sixth existing shot. this will increase the total number of shots from 7 to 9. we'll create these new shots to fit seamlessly into the story progression, maintaining the magical and whimsical atmosphere of the scene. we'll update the list_display_order and add the new shots with random two-letter keys. we'll also update the "number_of_shots" field to reflect the new total.
